result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: 11:03 AM Defendant Shane Russell Curtin in court, in custody.  Attorney Tayyibah Ingrid Sethi appeared by phone for Shane Russell Curtin.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin. 950/Marsy's Law complied with. Victim makes statement to the Court. This case DRI, Def entered a plea in case 22CM262.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 19, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:58 PM Defendant Shane Russell Curtin appeared by phone, in custody.  Attorney Tayyibah Ingrid Sethi appeared by phone for Shane Russell Curtin.  Attorney Rebecca Meyer appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin. Court informs parties we were waiting since 10am for the State. Not able to proceed with plea/sentence/Court does not believe to drop the Domestic Abuse at this time and reserves judgment. 950/Marsy's Law complied with, victim present and makes a statement to the Court. Atty Sethi requests no violent or abusive contact. State objects for reason stated on the record. Court denies bond motion by Atty Sethi for reasons stated on the record. Court's JA will call DA Urmanski for new plea/sentence date.
Bail/bond hearing on September 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

4:32 PM Attorney Tayyibah Ingrid Sethi appeared by phone for Shane Russell Curtin.  Prosecuting attorney Daniel j Gabler Mr. appeared by phone for the State of Wisconsin. Court rcvd' email that Deft could not appear Today, JA will set another hearing. Atty Sethi was unaware about Client not appearing. Victim on phone makes statement.
